rows.label: qev060102_MSG0001
rows.name:
Blast! Shiraton's running late, and I really need to get
this stuff dealt with soon...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060102_JNK0010
rows.name: Explain

rows.label: qev060102_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell Jeffrey that you're here in Shiraton's stead.

rows.label: qev060102_JNK0020
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev060102_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask what exactly Jeffrey is trying to offload.

rows.label: qev060102_MSG0002
rows.name:
Well, there's a whole load of toxic research samples,
as well as...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060102_MSG0003
rows.name: WAUGH! Wh-who are you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060102_MSG0004
rows.name: ...Huh? Shiraton sent you to collect the voltant?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060102_MSG0005
rows.name:
Ah, perfect! The cold storage facility is nearly
overflowing with used test samples and all kinds of
other nasty things.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060102_MSG0006
rows.name:
I'm quite eager to get it all disposed of.
...So here. Take this capsule.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060102_MSG0007
rows.name:
Er, and you're SURE the Zaruboggan can purify all
of this toxic material?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060102_MSG0008
rows.name:
Even the Ma-non can't do that, and they possess all
manner of advanced technology.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060102_JNK0030
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev060102_SEL0031
rows.name: Assure Jeffrey that the Zaruboggan will do as promised.

rows.label: qev060102_JNK0040
rows.name: Evade

rows.label: qev060102_SEL0041
rows.name: Mumble something about how you're probably sure.

rows.label: qev060102_MSG0009
rows.name:
If so, that's some ability!
I'd be curious to watch them at work sometime.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060102_MSG0010
rows.name:
Hmm. Then I should probably go and have a look for
myself before trusting them with any more toxic waste.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060102_MSG0011
rows.name:
I'll finish up a few things here, then pay Shiraton a
visit and see this devoltanizing thing firsthand.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060102_MSG0012
rows.name:
...You say he's by Rosemoss? Ah, excellent.
I'll go look for him there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060102_MSG0013
rows.name:
Most of my research involves Miran pathogens and
other highly toxic matter.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060102_MSG0014
rows.name:
I try to use as little as possible, obviously, but once a
run of experiments is done, there's always dangerous
waste left overâ€”or "voltant," as Shiraton calls it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060102_MSG0015
rows.name:
As it's built up, I've been wracking my brain for a way
to safely dispose of it all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060102_MSG0016
rows.name:
If they really do have this power, it could be incredibly
useful in my research.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060102_MSG0017
rows.name:
I'll drop by Rosemoss later and ask Shiraton for a
demonstration of this purification trick they do.[ST:wait ]
